items.content: Our workplace is fully accessible for people who use mobility aids (e.g. wider doorways, obstruction-free corridors, ramp access, lifts to all floors).
items.label: mobility aids

items.content: Our essential facilities (e.g. toilets, reception, printers) are on the main floor of our workplace.
items.label: essential facilities

items.content: We have accessible breakout spaces for employees with appropriate facilities (e.g. accessible seats, sensory spaces).
items.label: breakout spaces

items.content: We have flexible and remote working policies, with true flexibility of core business hours.
items.label: flexible work

items.content: Our service points offer the same experience for disabled and non-disabled people (e.g. mid-height counters).
items.label: service points

items.content: Our employee and customer toilets comply with disability access guidelines.
items.label: toilets

items.content: We provide assistive hardware for our employees or customers (e.g. adjustable desks and lighting, adaptive chairs, hearing loops, large print keyboards).
items.label: assistive hardware

items.content: Our signage is short, easy to read and clearly signposts people to specific areas within our workspace.
items.label: signage

items.content: We have different versions of our printed materials with larger text, alternative colour combinations, etc.
items.label: printed materials

items.content: We have enough accessible parking for employees and customers.
items.label: parking

items.content: Our workplace is close to an accessible public transport link OR we have an accessible taxi service we book on behalf of customers or employees.
items.label: public transport

items.content: We understand and use the government Access To Work Scheme.
items.label: access to work schema

items.content: We have an accessibility statement on our website which clearly explains how we can cater to a variety of needs.
items.label: accessibility statement

items.content: Our marketing and social media content is accessible (e.g. ‘camel case’ hashtags, image descriptions, subtitled videos).
items.label: social media

items.content: People can contact our business in different ways (e.g. phone, email, live chat, text or WhatsApp message).
items.label: contact

items.content: We use accessibility checkers on all web pages and documents created for customers and employees.
items.label: accessibility checkers

items.content: We provide assistive technologies for our employees (e.g. screen readers, closed captions for online meetings).
items.label: assistive technologies

items.content: We have an inclusive customer journey and the experience of purchasing from / working with us is the same for disabled and non-disabled people.
items.label: customer journey

items.content: All internal and external company documents are readable by a screen reader, including job adverts.
items.label: screen reader

items.content: We provide an online attendance option for all our physical meetings and events.
items.label: online attendance

items.content: Our job application process enables alternative methods of application and interview (e.g. video and audio, sign language interpreters).
items.label: job application process

items.content: All images and PDFs on our intranet and external website are readable via screen reader.
items.label: images-pdfs

items.content: We subtitle or close caption all internal and external video and audio content.
items.label: close captioning

items.content: We provide all our staff with training in working with their disabled and neurodiverse colleagues.
items.label: staff training

items.content: We provide our managers with training in managing disabled and neurodiverse team members with empathy.
items.label: management training

items.content: We have a well-being and mental health policy for employees.
items.label: mental health

items.content: We use case studies, marketing materials and imagery that reflect our diverse society.
items.label: case studies and marketing

items.content: We actively recruit team members with diverse needs and levels of ability.
items.label: recruiting

items.content: Our employees (including our leadership team) represent and reflect our diverse society.
items.label: diverse team

items.content: We have a non-biased job application process.We have a non-biased job application process.
items.label: job application process
